reviews.review:
CS:GO is an excellent game. It is not perfect, no game is, however, when playing this game i never find myself wondering how i was killed, or that I was shot around corners. The direct gun fights are balanced.

Worth noting: There is a steep learning curve. This is not a pick up and run shooter like anything else. The weapon spray is not illustrated by the movement of your crosshair, you have to pace your shots or learn the weapons' spray patterns. Aside from that just get used to the flow and you'll be good.

A change I would like to see, with the success this game has, I would appreciate Valve shifting over to higher refresh servers.
